actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that Congress should unwaveringly uphold the dignity and independence of older Americans.
subjects: Housing for the elderly and disabled

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that Congress should unwaveringly uphold the dignity and independence of older Americans by supporting efforts that guarantee for them: (1) financial security; (2) quality and affordable health and long-term care; (3) protection from abuse, scams, and exploitation; (4) a strong economy now and for future generations; and (5) safe and liveable communities with adequate housing and transportation options.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that Congress should unwaveringly uphold the dignity and independence of older Americans.
